H0.text: The word 'pukka', referring to genuine/good quality, is from which language. Sanskrit

H1.text: The word 'pukka', referring to genuine/good quality, is from which language. Urdu

H2.text: The word 'pukka', referring to genuine/good quality, is from which language. Tamil

H3.text: The word 'pukka', referring to genuine/good quality, is from which language. Hindustani

A4.text: Pukka sahib, an Indian term for British civil servants
